content: the edge of the heel flap knit across the heel flap sdtches then knit all of the picked-up sdtches through the back loop 4 now switch to the top side of the sock purl the first two sdtches together the picked-up sdtch between the heel and top of the sock and the sdtch immediately following it knit across the top of the sock in pa ern to the last two sdtches the picked-up sdtch between the heel and top of the sock and the sdtch immediately prior to it then p2togtbl switch to the heel flap side of the sock knit all of the picked-up sdtches through the back loop the knit to the last three sdtches before the top side of the sock then k2tog k1 gusset decreases gusset decrease round 1 work across the top of the sock in pa ern on the heel flap side of the sock k1 ssk knit to end gusset decrease round 2 work across the top of the sock in pa ern on the heel flap side of the sock knit to the last three sdtches then k2tog k1 repeat these two row undl there are 56 64 72 sdtches in total 28 32 36 on the top of the foot and 28 32 36 on the sole foot for the foot the 28 32 36 sdtches on the top of the foot will be worked in the ribbed pa ern the sole of the foot will be knit in stockine e condnue working in pa ern as set undl foot measures 4 5 5 5 5 cm 1 75 2 2 25 inches less than desired length toe toe round 1 decrease round k1 ssk k22 26 30 k2tog k2 ssk k22 26 30 k2tog k1 4 sdtches decreased toe round 2 knit all sdtches toe round 3 decrease round k1 ssk k20 24 28 two fewer than previous decrease round k2tog k2 ssk k20 24 28 two fewer than previous decrease round k2tog k1 4 sdtches decreased toe round 4 knit all sdtches knit in decrease pa ern as set here alternadng decrease rounds with knit rounds undl 28 32 36 sdtches remain then knit decrease rounds only undl 16 20 20 sdtches remain gral remaining sdtches together weave in ends and block 5
